headings: Fiware Orion gateway DFL,Option 2: Per-Device Custom JSON Format (Overrides Global Format)
content:
2. Create an attribute in your esthesis device, e.g., orion-custom-json. 4. Set the attribute value as a valid Qute template expression that outputs a valid Orion Fiware JSON. 6. Use the following variables in the template: - {category} - {timestamp} - {hardwareId} - {measurementName} - {measurementValue} 8. Put your created attribute name in the custom entity JSON configuration, e.g., orion-custom-json. 10. If this attribute is defined, it takes precedence over the global JSON format. This setup allows for flexibility:
- If a device-specific template is set, it will be used for that given device. - If not, the global template will be used.
pageTitle: Option 2: Per-Device Custom JSON Format (Overrides Global Format)
